results.title: Distinct effects of losartan and atenolol on vascular stiffness in Marfan syndrome.
results.text_hl: Distinct effects of @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on vascular @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@stiffness@@@ in @DISEASE_Marfan_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D008382 @@@Marfan syndrome@@@.

results.title: Effects of renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system inhibitors and beta-blockers on markers of arterial stiffness.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@Nebivolol@@@ could have a better impact than @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@, by increasing the bioavailability of endothelium-derived @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@.

citations.NLM: Koumaras C, Tziomalos K, Stavrinou E, Katsiki N, Athyros VG, Mikhailidis DP, Karagiannis A. Effects of renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system inhibitors and beta-blockers on markers of arterial stiffness. J Am Soc Hypertens. 2014 Feb;8(2):74-82. PMID: 24139833

results.title: A meta-analytical comparison of atenolol with angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors on arterial stiffness, peripheral blood pressure and heart rate in hypertensive patients.

results.title: [Predictors of cardiovascular mortality and morbidity in hypertension].
results.text_hl: Major evidence of the efficacy of antihypertensive agents in these components of blood pressure has come from a study which found that low-dose @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@/@CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@ but not @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ reduced central pulse pressure and @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@.
